name: URigVMVariableNode
doc:
The Variable Node represents a mutable value / local state within the
the Function / Graph. Variable Node's can be a getter or a setter.
Getters are pure nodes with just an output value pin, while setters
are mutable nodes with an execute and input value pin.

methods.name: GetCPPType
methods.doc: Returns the C++ data type of the variable

methods.name: GetCPPTypeObject
methods.doc: Returns the C++ data type struct of the variable (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetDefaultValue
methods.doc: Returns the default value of the variable as a string

methods.name: GetVariableDescription
methods.doc: Returns this variable node's variable description

methods.name: GetVariableName
methods.doc: Returns the name of the variable

methods.name: IsExternalVariable
methods.doc: Returns true if this variable is an external variable

methods.name: IsGetter
methods.doc: Returns true if this node is a variable getter

methods.name: IsInputArgument
methods.doc: Returns true if this variable is an input argument

methods.name: IsLocalVariable
methods.doc: Returns true if this variable is a local variable
